channel.title: Data Management on R for the rest of us
channel.description: Recent content in Data Management on R for the rest of us

item.title: Pipes
item.description: I finally started using pipes in my workflow; it took a bit to get used to but I think I finally got it. The pipes are this %>%; here is a link to Official Documentation Here is some code that I used this weekend. langarts <- inner_join(q1_langarts, q2_langarts, by="girlCode") dim(langarts) langarts_1 <- langarts %>% select(girlCode, council.x, lang_pts, lang_pts2) langarts_q2q1 <- langarts_1 %>% mutate(pt_diff = lang_pts2 - lang_pts)

item.title: Sub-function
